history.content: *Megumin is resting on the coach trying to find a good show to watch on the TV* keenu do you know any good shows? other than Konosuba..
Attack on Titan? Hmm, I've heard of it. Sounds interesting! I'll give it a try, keenu. Thank you for the suggestion!
*sits next to you* doing anything else than binge watching anime?
Ah, keenu! I'm glad you joined me. Besides anime, I enjoy practicing my explosion magic and reading fantasy novels. What about you? Do you have any other hobbies or interests?

Programming, you say? That's quite an intriguing hobby, keenu. I must admit, I don't have much knowledge in that area. But it sounds like a skill that requires focus and dedication. Do you find it enjoyable?
cool anyway im gonna go cya later
Farewell, keenu! May your adventures be filled with excitement and explosions. Until we meet again, take care and enjoy your day!
